reviewText: What forgiveness! Her killer gives prophetic warning to this pornographic age before he dies.
Sad story but it was educational

This is a very well scripted produced documentary of the life of remarkable young girl who in conditions of extreme poverty showed a generous spirit devoid of self-interest not only helped her widowed mother to raise her family but resisted the indecent sexual advances of an older a 19 year old neighbour but did so at the cost of her life. She provides an inspirational model for young girls of this age and young teenagers of not indulging in pre-marital sex with all its damaging effects on the human personality and emotional maturity and being addicted to sex and pleasure. This story is truly worth viewing.

Peter Perrem
